text: definition of abused child sexual reassignment added amend rsa ii f to read as follows f subjected to an act prohibited by rsa or g subjected to drug treatments or surgery in an attempt to alter the sex of the child assigned at birth except in rare cases of ambiguous genitalia for purposes of this subparagraph ambiguous genitalia refers to a medical condition in which a child s gender at birth is in question because the genitals do not appear clearly male or female
